importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The article does not specify an exact release date for the series, only that it will premiere soon. As such, no specific date is provided in the article.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The series begins in the 1930s and charts the rise of the Kennedy family through to 1956, providing historical context to the family's ascent and the early years of John F. Kennedy’s life.

keyTakeAways: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956'.
The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the triumphs and tragedies of the Kennedy family.
The show begins in the 1930s and traces the rise of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack Kennedy, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother.
The narrative is described as blending American mythology with a nuanced exploration of personal struggles, family dynamics, and historical context.
The series is not related to the upcoming Ryan Murphy-produced 'American Love Story' focusing on JFK Jr.
The show will consist of eight episodes and has not yet been released, with no official release date provided.
The Kennedy family is a central figure in American political history, producing multiple U.S. presidents and political leaders, and has been associated with a 'curse' due to multiple tragedies.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography of the Kennedy family, set to explore the rise and tragedies of the family from the 1930s to 1956. The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and follows his family’s journey, including the complex life of his son Jack, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother. The show is described as blending American myth with personal stories of ambition, loss, and legacy, and is not to be confused with an upcoming Ryan Murphy series on JFK Jr. The series will consist of eight episodes but has no official release date.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
